title: A rule that could upend the gig economy
itunes:title: A rule that could upend the gig economy
itunes:author: Marketplace / Kai Ryssdal
description: A recent proposal by the Joe Biden administration could reclassify gig workers as employees rather than independent contractors and expand benefits and protections for millions of Americans. Today, a look at what the move would mean for workers and companies. Also, big but slowing price increases for producers, a dramatic cooling in the mortgage business and a firsthand account of Hurricane Ian’s damage near Fort Myers, Florida.
